text: cuvarkka vacikal, naraka vacikalai alaittu, "enkalukku enkal iraivan alittirunta vakkurutiyai niccayamakavum, unmaiyakavum perruk kontom; unkalukku unkal iraivan alitta vakkurutiyai ninkal unmaiyil perruk kontirkala?" Enru ketparkal. Atarku avarkal, "am (perruk kontom" enparkal. Appotu avarkalukkitaiye arivippavar oruvar, "akkiramakkararkalin mitu allahvin capam untavataka!" Enru arivippar)
